ygData.subject: Chrysiana's answers
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/3/2000 1:53:16 AM Pacific Daylight Time, EQ_Potters@egroups.com writes: Well met Chrysiana ... keep /BUGging Verant - a few have suggested
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/3/2000 1:53:16 AM Pacific Daylight Time,
EQ_Potters@egroups.com writes:

Well met Chrysiana

> Deities but I cannot ready either.

keep /BUGging Verant - a few have suggested that thrown weapons
are useless to us as a "class", mayhap work in Thrown or Ammo if
they fix.

> Also what is the use for lined vials?

Advanced poisons require them.
Rouge's hang out over at the Safehouse if you want more details.

> I know rogues use the regular ones for poison

Snake, Spider and Wasp are not as "dangerous" Putrid Bane

Most rouges find Pottery a 20p skill to master as most have
once they begin mixing their toxins. Enchanters who also tailor
quickly find throwing clay also a compliment to advance baking.
The location to find the Viscous Mana is in Lesser Faydark's
fairie camp, although, personally never been.

There is a Tinkerer's niche for Pie Tins to make compasses.
Not easy to find them in Ak'Anon other than smithing.

Cleric Taven
